subject: Extension of time period of Conciliation Committees of Independent Experts 3 (CCIEs 3)- reg.
text: HRay <5y  rTHPf giferabrut (Tsw 9dev # RTTHPf HATTY,   HRMT TrTR) National Highways Authority of India 7444 *Ia (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways, Government of India) #il-5 Qd 6, #a27-10, ETa5T, 7f faarit 110 075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka; New Delhi-110075 TH4/Phone 91-11-25074100 / 25074200 NHAI/Policy Guidelines/Dispute Resolution/2022 Policy Circular No.2.1.55/2022, Dated 29th July, 2022 (Decision taken on e-office File No. NHACMDLCCIExtn /2020-21 (Comp.No.5472) ) Sub: Extension of time period of Conciliation Committees of Independent Experts-3 (CCIE-3) . NHAI vide Policy Circular No_ 2.1.23/2017 dated 02.06.2017 established a conciliation and settlement mechanism for the early resolution and settlement of claims arising out of the contractual disputes under the contract agreements with the contractors/ concessionaires/ consultants in NHAI. The CCIE-3 was constituted and published vide Policy Circular 2.1.31/2019 dated 16.09.2019, The broad  Terms & Conditions and Terms of Reference of the Committeel Experts (CCIE-3) are as per Annexure 1 of Policy dated 02.06.2017 and amendment dated 19.06.2017, 18.07.2018 and 03.08.2018. As per Annexure- 1 of the Policy Circular dated 02.06.2017, the panel of Independent Experts approved under guideline dated 16.09.2019 is valid upto 15.09.2022. 2 _ At present, the composition of Conciliation Committees of Independent Experts-3 is as under: Sh: Vijay Chhibber, IAS (Retd.) ii. Sh_ B.N. Singh, Ex DG (RD) & SS, MoRT&H iii . Sh: N.R. Dash, Ex Addl. Controller General, Ministry of Defence 3_ Now the Competent Authority has extended the tenure/terms of the aforesaid Committee for a further period of one year i.e. from 16.09.2022 to 15.09.2023. 4_ This issues with the approval of Competent Authority. 22 (Sanjay Kumar Patel) General Manager (Coord.)
